concept.title: Shelve
concept.shortdesc: The Shelve function returns nodes to the the outer ring that orbits the central graph.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: Shelving a node will place a nodes back on the Shelf, regardless of whether it is in a Graphed, Hidden or Discarded State.
Nodes can be shelved both manually and in the Commands Tab.To shelve ONLY Discarded nodes, use the Retrieve function.
